name: Grifford Academy
storyline:
“Where spirits live, and shadows gnaw, lies the path to the mind's door.”

Join Erika, Viva, Cap as they fall into the mystical book of Caldria and explore the dynamic world filled with menacing creatures and otherworldly discoveries. How they defeat sinister enemies and the decisions you make about the personality flaws they possess, play a critical role as to who the characters become.

As memories and stories of life in Grifford Academy are revealed you get to decide: Will Erika become a better leader by listening to her friends? Will Viva transform from self-doubt to self-trust? Will Cap muster up the courage to stay in Caldria and help Erika find her missing brother? And will these three high school misfits gain confidence in who they are while successfully saving their missing friends, trapped within the ominous world of Caldria?
summary: Join Erika and friends in an empowering coming-of-age turn-based RPG as they journey into a mystical book realm. Equip unique items and tailor your party’s abilities to battle vicious monsters. Test the strength of friendship, teamwork and personal growth as the secrets of the book unfold.
